name: Ghosts of New England
description:
Great-Aunt Carolyn is dead.

Katherine Cross returns to the home of her recently-deceased great-aunt to locate her will. But she gets more than she bargained for, as the will's contents plunge her headfirst into a conspiracy a century old with her family at the center of it, brushing shoulders with American history at every turn.

In this demo of Ghosts of New England, explore the home of Carolyn Cross and uncover her many secrets.
